name: LinearOrderedField.smul_Ioo
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedField K
a b r : K
hr : LT.lt 0 r
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul r (Set.Ioo a b)) (Set.Ioo (HSMul.hSMul r a) (HSMul.hSMul r b))
decl: theorem smul_Ioo : r • Ioo a b = Ioo (r • a) (r • b) := (OrderIso.mulLeft₀ r hr).image_Ioo a b
